results.title: Chronic treatment with lisinopril decreases proliferative and apoptotic pathways in autosomal recessive polycystic kidney disease.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ treatment resulted in an approximately 30% improvement in the collecting duct cystic indices (CT CI) of @<m>DISEASE_Polycystic_Kidney_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007690 @@@PCK@@@ animals.

citations.NLM: Jia G, Kwon M, Liang HL, Mortensen J, Nilakantan V, Sweeney WE, Park F. Chronic treatment with lisinopril decreases proliferative and apoptotic pathways in autosomal recessive polycystic kidney disease. Pediatr Nephrol. 2010 Jun;25(6):1139-46. PMID: 20229187
